Package system.data.odbc

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IOdbcInfoMessageEventHandler
    The Java interface to be implemented to receive events from the CLR using OdbcInfoMessageEventHandler.
    IOdbcRowUpdatedEventHandler
    The Java interface to be implemented to receive events from the CLR using OdbcRowUpdatedEventHandler.
    IOdbcRowUpdatingEventHandler
    The Java interface to be implemented to receive events from the CLR using OdbcRowUpdatingEventHandler.
